attributes.action: A PETITION TO ENCOURAGE PRIVATE LANDLORDS TO ACCEPT DOMESTIC PETS.
attributes.additional_details: So many tenants including many on benefits are losing out on properties simply because the landlord does not wants pets we understand some pets can be destructive like large dogs and we understand landlord concerns yet all pets are refused when surely a landlord can easily find a compromise.
attributes.background: Tenants pay a deposit to cover damages including from pets!! So many landlords restrict tenants from bringing there pets which just should they be doing this considering. We want landlords to take every measure possible to allow tenants to retain the right to keep their pets.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315909
